name: Loaded Die (Matthewanimation)
description:
Throw your head in order to take down enemies, beware that  every time you hit an enemy the world's rules change.  Get to the end and defeat the evil conductor and free yourself from the curse!

Best played on Windows as HTML is extremely bugged

controls:

A-D: Move left to and right

W and space : Jump

Left Click: Throw Head

Credits:

- Mattstov: Pixelart - Programming - sound effects

- Natestov: Music

- Temposparkz for porting to HTML
